unnormalised: **Automotive News: Decoding Fuel Efficiency for the Indian Driver**
normalised: **Automotive News: Decoding Fuel Efficiency for the Indian Driver**

unnormalised: New Delhi, Oct 26th – As fuel prices remain a hot topic in India, understanding fuel efficiency is crucial for budget-conscious car owners. Experts at IIT-Delhi's Automotive Research Wing are conducting workshops to educate consumers on maximizing 'mileage'.
normalised: New Delhi, October twenty sixth – As fuel prices remain a hot topic in India, understanding fuel efficiency is crucial for budget-conscious car owners. Experts at I I T-Delhi's Automotive Research Wing are conducting workshops to educate consumers on maximizing 'mileage'.

unnormalised: Fuel efficiency, typically measured in kilometers per liter (km/l), indicates how far a vehicle can travel on one liter of fuel. Several factors influence this: driving style, vehicle maintenance, and even tire pressure.
normalised: Fuel efficiency, typically measured in kilometers per liter (kilometer slash liter), indicates how far a vehicle can travel on one liter of fuel. Several factors influence this: driving style, vehicle maintenance, and even tire pressure.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma, Head of the IIT-D program, emphasizes consistent speeds and avoiding sudden acceleration as key techniques. Regular servicing, including oil changes and air filter replacements, is also vital.
normalised: Doctor Sharma, Head of the I I T-D program, emphasizes consistent speeds and avoiding sudden acceleration as key techniques. Regular servicing, including oil changes and air filter replacements, is also vital.

unnormalised: Choosing the right vehicle also matters. Smaller, lighter cars generally offer better fuel economy than larger SUVs. Even features like aerodynamic designs, tested in wind tunnels spanning over 2000 sq ft, contribute significantly.
normalised: Choosing the right vehicle also matters. Smaller, lighter cars generally offer better fuel economy than larger S U V s. Even features like aerodynamic designs, tested in wind tunnels spanning over two thousand square feet, contribute significantly.

unnormalised: For example, Maruti Suzuki's popular models are known for their good mileage, often exceeding 25 km/l under ideal conditions. Considering all factors can help save thousands of Rupees (Rs.) annually on fuel costs. This Diwali, drive smart, save money, and reduce your carbon footprint! The workshops continue until Nov 10th.
normalised: For example, Maruti Suzuki's popular models are known for their good mileage, often exceeding twenty five kilometers per liter under ideal conditions. Considering all factors can help save thousands of rupees annually on fuel costs. This Diwali, drive smart, save money, and reduce your carbon footprint! The workshops continue until November tenth.
